import React from "react" import "./style.css" import LoadingOverlay from "react-loading-overlay" import PaperPlane from "../../svg/paperplane.svg" import InfoCircle from "../../svg/info-circle.svg" const CenterForm = ({ threads, selectedThread, formData, handleChangeForm, sendForm, command, handleChange, showTextField, textFieldValue, setTextFieldValue, sendCommands, deleteGeneration, regenerateGeneration, delilahWorking, }) => { const isFormSubmitted = threads.find((thread) => thread.id === selectedThread)?.generations .length > 0 const handleChangeTextField = (e) => { setTextFieldValue(e.target.value) } const sendFormComponent = () => { return (
{ e.preventDefault() sendForm() }} > {/* add more padding the the */}
{/* select form type */} {/* align the contents to the left */}
{/* remove the padding in the selecter */}
{/* form fields */} {formData.prompt_choices.map((promptChoice, index) => (
handleChangeForm(e, index)} placeholder={promptChoice.choice_type} />
))}
) } const sendCommandsComponent = () => { return (
{/* add a small info button with a circle that is not filled. make it black and have some padding */}
{showTextField && (
)}
) } return (
{!isFormSubmitted ? sendFormComponent() : sendCommandsComponent()}
) } export default CenterForm
